====Definitions====
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[few]]; [[little]] in number; [[less]]; not [[many]]
#* {{zh-x|很 少{shǎo} 人 知道 實情。|Very '''few''' people know the truth.}}
#* {{zh-x|只有 很 少{shǎo} 麵包 和 餅乾{gā}。|There is only very '''little''' bread and biscuits.}}
# [[weak]]; [[inadequate]]; [[insufficient]]
# {{†}} {{zh-alt-form|小|[[small]]; [[tiny]]}}
# to [[lack]]; to be [[short]] of; to be [[deficient]]
#* {{zh-x|臥室 裡 少{shǎo} 一 隻 電燈泡。|There's a light bulb '''missing''' in the bedroom.}}
# to [[reduce]] (the amount or extent); to [[weaken]]; to [[lose]]; to [[stop]]; to [[cease]]
#* {{zh-x|他 屋 裡 少{shǎo} 了 東西{xi}。|He '''lost''' something in his house.}}
#* {{zh-x|少{shǎo} 說 廢話！|'''Stop''' chattering!}}
# {{†}} to [[despise]]; to [[look down]]; to [[belittle]]
# [[slightly]]; [[moderately]]; [[a little]]; [[a bit]]
# [[seldom]]; [[rarely]]; [[infrequently]]
#* {{zh-x|懶惰 的 人 很 少{shǎo} 會 成功。|Lazy people '''seldom''' succeed.}}
# in a [[little]] [[while]]; [[in]] a [[moment]]
